mapper.insert: INSERT INTO video ( video_id, channel_title, title, view_count, rating, published_at, part, video_status, member_id, introduce_text, description ) VALUES ( #{videoId}, #{channelTitle}, #{title}, #{viewCount}, #{rating}, #{publishedAt}, #{part}, #{videoStatus}, #{memberId}, #{introduceText}, #{description} )
mapper.select: SELECT * FROM video WHERE video_status = 'APPROVED' ORDER BY view_count DESC LIMIT 8
SELECT * FROM video WHERE video_status = 'APPROVED' ORDER BY rating DESC LIMIT 3
SELECT * FROM video WHERE video_status = 'APPROVED' ORDER BY published_at DESC LIMIT 3
SELECT * FROM video WHERE video_status = 'APPROVED' ORDER BY view_count DESC
SELECT * FROM video WHERE video_status = 'APPROVED' AND rating IS NOT NULL ORDER BY rating DESC
SELECT * FROM video WHERE video_status = 'APPROVED' ORDER BY published_at DESC
SELECT * FROM video WHERE video_status = 'APPROVED' AND (title LIKE CONCAT('%', #{keyword}, '%') OR channel_title LIKE CONCAT('%', #{keyword}, '%'))
SELECT * FROM video WHERE video_status = 'PENDING' ORDER BY published_at LIMIT 8
